I don't know this question is appropriate here . i have written some code
t=
hat uses junit 4.x (i.e. with Annotations). I works fine when i run it on
n=
etbeans IDE.  i am using junit-4.6.jar.  But it throws a
"junit.framework.A=
ssertionFailedError: No tests found in Test" when i run
through junitee or =
cactus servlets. I think junitee has no support for
junit4.x in its servlet=
 runner. But i dont know whether cactus has the
support for running junit4.=
x test classes. Please advice!...

Regards
pjerald.
